doc.field: The archeological zone of Palenque compiled from maps drawn by H.W. Price in 1891 ... by Blom and La Farge in 1925 ... and by the Instituto Nacional de Antropologia e Historia in 1965 ... ; and from a map drawn by Linda Schele after reconnaissances by her, Jay Johnson, and Robert L. Rands in 1964 ... ; corrected on the site in June 1980 by David Bylund, Richard Martinez, and J. Brody Neuenschwander of the Princeton Palenque Expedition ; drawn by David Bylund ; edited by Alfred L. Bush.

The archeological zone of Palenque compiled from maps drawn by H.W. Price in 1891 ... by Blom and La Farge in 1925 ... and by the Instituto Nacional de Antropologia e Historia in 1965 ... ; and from a map drawn by Linda Schele after reconnaissances by her, Jay Johnson, and Robert L. Rands in 1964 ... ; corrected on the site in June 1980 by David Bylund, Richard Martinez, and J. Brody Neuenschwander of the Princeton Palenque Expedition ; drawn by David Bylund ; edited by Alfred L. Bush.
